CVXPY
Maximize
  x
Subject To
 11: reshape(x, (1,), F) <= [1.]
Bounds
 x free
End
----------------------------------------
AFTER COMPILATION
Minimize
  - C0
Subject To
 R0: C0 <= 1
Bounds
 C0 free
End
----------------------------------------
GUROBI
Maximize
  x
Subject To
 11[0]: x <= 1
Bounds
 x free
End
